text: Karaoke KT was a fantastic experience! The ambiance was cozy and inviting, making it a great place to relax and have fun. The venue was well-maintained, and the staff were friendly and accommodating. I also loved that they had a great selection of new songs to choose from. Overall, a wonderful spot for karaoke lovers

First time visiting teo heng, area is clean and tidy, price is pretty reasonable, and theres even promotion going on ! Kudos to one of the staff in assisting, when i was curious how big the room was, gave me suggestions on the room that i should take, and even showed me how to use the system. Didn't catch his name, he is a young gentleman that wears a jacket. Very passionate and polite !

Visited on a busy Saturday night. The equipment is new, and each room has its own air purifier. We appreciate that it’s a non-smoking facility, although we did experience a brief issue when someone(found out later, a foreigner who didn’t know the rules) in another room tried to light a cigarette. The smoke traveled through the HVAC system and entered our room. However, the staff handled the situation very professionally — they addressed it immediately, reprimanded the guest, and ensured it didn’t happen again. They even offered us an extra 30 minutes time extension as an apology, which was a nice gesture. Overall, a good experience despite the minor hiccup.
The ambience is nice since it's located in a new estate. Easy to find,clean & friendly staff! :)
Great that they have a mini room option! Place is clean and service is really nice!
